content: Tutto a un tratto vidi una forma umana in lontananza, e, con mia sorpresa, ben presto riconobbi che il viaggiatore era una donna.
translations: eng:All at once I saw a human form in the distance, and, to my surprise, soon recognized that the traveler was a woman
credits: Sentence from Tatoeba by Guybrush88 (CC-BY 2.0 FR)
